entry.title: Exploring Ruby with clangd
entry.summary: I've managed to get LSP-based IDE features powered by clangd working for the Ruby VM's source code (in my case, in Vim). Here's how I did it!

entry.title: Search Down the Stack
entry.summary: I've found it useful to search though the source code of things lower in the stack lately.

entry.title: Profiling in Haskell for a 10x Speedup

link.title: Profiling in Haskell for a 10x Speedup

entry.summary: I wrote up a toy project in Haskell and profiled it to learn about Haskell's profiling tools and about profiling code in general. Profiling in Haskell with Stack is super easy...
